product.name: Solution Rock Shoes
product.description: The high-performancee La Sportiva Solution rock shoes hook, grab, edge, and smear to help you solve challenging bouldering problems.

product.name: Gravity superDRY 10.0mm x 60m Dry Rope
product.description: The Mammut Gravity superDRYâ„¢ 10.2mm x 60m dry rope has great all-around characteristics for sport, trad and alpine climbing.

product.name: Rope Bag Pro
product.description: Protect your climbing rope from abrasive dirt and harmful UV rays with the Mammut Rope Bag Pro.

product.name: Momentum SA Climbing Harness
product.description: The all-around Black Diamond Momentum SA climbing harness balances durability, breathability and comfort for sport climbing?, multipitch trad routes and glacier ascents.

product.name: Simba Climbing Harness - Kids'
product.description: Little tykes have you climbing the walls? Turn the tables on them with this Petzl Simba full body climbing harness made to fit 5 to 10 year olds.

product.name: Positron Screwgate Carabiner
product.description: The unique keylock nose prevents this carabiner from snagging on pro--it's clean and easy to clip!

product.name: Elios Climbing Helmet
product.description: The versatile and adjustable Petzl Elios helmet provides protection when you're climbing, canyoning, caving and mountaineering.

product.name: PosiWire Quickpack Quickdraw Set - Package of 6
product.description: Load up with this Black Diamond PosiWire Quickpack quickdraw set and head to the crag.

product.name: Smart Alpine Belay Device 8.9 - 10.5mm
product.description: The Mammut Smart Alpine belay device employs all the great belay-assist features of the original Smart device, but can also be used with half or twin ropes for trips up alpine peaks.

product.name: Contact Sling Dyneema 8.0
product.description: Leave those old bulky slings at home! The slim Mammut Contact Sling 8.0 weighs only 14g (60cm length) and has great handling characteristics to make clipping easy.
